documents.text: We love this trail and make the trip every year. The views are breathtaking and well worth the hike!
Poorly marked trails! I thought we were goners. Worst hike ever.
Everyone in my family liked the trail but thought it was too challenging for the less athletic among us. Not necessarily recommended for small children.
It was foggy so we missed the spectacular views, but the trail was ok. Worth checking out if you are in the area.
This is my favorite trail. It has beautiful views and many places to stop and rest
